title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.18 - Managers' records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.18 - Managers' records

State Regulations

Licensed managers shall keep accurate records of the receipts
and expenses of the professional boxer or professional mixed martial artist
under their management and control. Such records shall be available to such
professional combatants and the Commission, upon request. Notes

208.18

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
